data.comment: In the minute -1, 20782 spectators have come along to Gazprom Arena today.
The big names in today's match at Gazprom Arena have now been confirmed.
Igor Panin starts the match. Saint Petersburg with the kick-off in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 3, Viacheslav Karavaev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Nikita Chicherin (Tambov) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg attack through Malcom. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Tambov.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Artem Dzyuba's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Goal kick for Tambov at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 11, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Aleksandre Karapetian of Tambov is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 12, Tambov needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Igor Panin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 15, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Tambov at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Tambov at Gazprom Arena.
Igor Panin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Sebastian Driussi (Saint Petersburg) has received a yellow card from Igor Panin.
In the minute 23, Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Artem Dzyuba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 24, Tambov's Pavel Karasev is on target but unsuccessful.
Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 26, Viacheslav Karavaev of Saint Petersburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Tambov's area.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Saint Petersburg drives forward and Daniil Krugovoy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Valeriu Ciuperca is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 34, Valeriu Ciuperca is back on his feet again.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 36, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Douglas Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tambov defender.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 39, Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 40, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Goal! Douglas Santos gives Saint Petersburg a 1-0 lead in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 41, Viacheslav Karavaev with an assist there.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 43, Saint Petersburg's Douglas Santos misses with an attempt on goal.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 45, At Gazprom Arena the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Yaroslav Rakitskiy, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Saint Petersburg - Tambov with the kick-off.
Goal! Saint Petersburg extend their lead to 2-0 through Malcom.
Daniil Krugovoy instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 50, Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg drive forward through Sardar Azmoun. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tambov needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Tambov make their first substitution with Guram Tetrashvili replacing Valeriu Ciuperca.
Sergey Pervushin is making the team's second substitution at Gazprom Arena with Vladimir Kabakhidze replacing Pavel Karasev.
Sardar Azmoun of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Igor Panin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Igor Panin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 55, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 58, Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, Saint Petersburg drive forward but Sardar Azmoun is judged offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Aleksandr Yerokhin is replacing Sebastian Driussi for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Free kick Tambov.
In the minute 61, Andrey Mostovoy is on a sub for Wilmar Barrios for Saint Petersburg.
Sergey Pervushin (Tambov) is making a third substitution, with Kirill Panchenko replacing Vladimir Obukhov.
Aleksandre Karapetian for the away team is judged to be offside.
Saint Petersburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 65, Vladimir Kabakhidze (Tambov) gets a yellow card.
Saint Petersburg's Aleksandr Yerokhin breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tambov at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg move into a more comfortable 3-0 lead. Aleksandr Yerokhin is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 68, Great play from Andrey Mostovoy to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Tambov.
The away team have replaced Aleksandre Karapetian with Vitali Balashov. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
The away team have replaced Oleksandr Kaplienko with Aleksandr Golovnya. This is the fifth substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
In the minute 74, Goal! Saint Petersburg extend their lead to 4-0 through Sardar Azmoun.
That's a fine assist from Aleksandr Yerokhin.
Magomed Ozdoev is replacing Douglas Santos for the home team.
In the minute 75, Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) is making a fourth substitution, with Emiliano Rigoni replacing Malcom.
Saint Petersburg's Aleksandr Yerokhin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tambov have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Tambov.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Igor Panin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Tambov in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Kirill Panchenko for Tambov drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg drive forward through Andrey Mostovoy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 84, Tambov are pushing forward but Anton Kilin's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 85, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 4-1 through a strike by Kirill Panchenko. .
That's a fine assist from Vladimir Kabakhidze.
The home team replace Artem Dzyuba with Aleksey Sutormin.
In the minute 87, Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Throw-in Tambov.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Igor Panin signals a Tambov throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Daniil Krugovoy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
Igor Panin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
Full-time! The final score is 4-1.
